title: 囍迎維吾爾族完成再造營課程人士投入勞動市場

replies.msg:
The Chinese government has resumed a job placement scheme for tens of thousands of Uygur Muslims who have completed compulsory programmes at the “re-education” camps in the far-western region of Xinjiang, sources said. 中國政府即將為數萬名完成新疆再造課程維吾爾族人士，提供就業計劃。

The plan, which includes a quota for the numbers provinces must take, was finalised last year but disrupted by the outbreak of Covid-19.
The delay threatens to undermine the Chinese government’s efforts to justify its use of internment camps in Xinjiang.計劃原於上年確定，但因新冠病毒病症（COVID-19）疫情受阻，計劃要求各省須根據配額接收維吾爾族人士。計劃受阻將危害中國政府為拘留營所作的辯解。）

Critics have said these camps were part of the measures designed to eradicate the ethnic and cultural identity of Uygurs and other Muslim minorities and that participants had no choice but to undertake the re-education programme. 有批評指出，再造營的設立是為了消除維吾爾族及其他穆斯琳少數族裔從文化及種族上的身份認同，而「被參加者」並無權選擇是否參與再改造計劃，只能服從。
